value.title: How The Human + Machine Workforce Is Being Accelerated By COVID-19
value.excerpt: Human + Machine partnerships are becoming even more critical and seeing greater investment and adoption as Covid-19 forces companies to innovate and digitally transform businesses faster to stay profitable and meet customers where they are.

value.title: Researchers use artificial intelligence to strengthen power grid resilience
value.excerpt: The US power grid system is not only large but dynamic, which makes it especially challenging to manage. Human operators know how to maintain systems when conditions are static. But when conditions change quickly operators lack a clear way of anticipating how the system should best adapt to meet system security and safety requirements.
